Class Referee

java.lang.Object
Referee
public class Referee
extends java.lang.Object
Provides data fields and methods to create a Referee in the Tic-Tac-Toe game. Referee starts the game and sets the players opponents and hands the play off initially to the X player.
Since:
2020-02-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Ledingham

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void runTheGame()
    Sets players as opponents, displays the board, and starts play with X player.
    void setBoard​(Board board)
    Sets playing board.
    void setoPlayer​(Player oPlayer)
    Sets player with O mark.
    void setxPlayer​(Player xPlayer)
    Sets player with X mark.
